definition: content with one's situation/to know contentment (hence happiness)

sentences.english: Abundance One of the most common human fears is scarcity.
sentences.chinese: 知足常樂貧窮是人類最普遍的恐懼之一。

sentences.english: Hi is the richest who is content with the least, for content is the wealth of nature.
sentences.chinese: 知足常樂者最富有，因爲知足本身就是財富。

sentences.english: Hi is the richest who is content with the least, for content is the wealth of nature.
sentences.chinese: 知足常樂者最富有，因爲知足本身就是財富。

sentences.english: Godliness add the content heart is the big interests.
sentences.chinese: 敬虔加上知足的心便是大利了。

sentences.english: A deep feeling of contentment and appreciation arose.
sentences.chinese: 一種深深的知足和感恩心油然生起。

sentences.english: Human agony mostly derives from discontentment.
sentences.chinese: 人的痛苦大多是源於不知足。

sentences.english: We also indifferent to contentment, not with sadness of heart.
sentences.chinese: 我們也要淡泊知足，不要有不捨之心。

sentences.english: And having food and raiment let us be therewith content.
sentences.chinese: 只要有衣有食，就當知足。

sentences.english: He is the richest who is content with the least, for content.
sentences.chinese: 知足者最富有，因爲知足是自然的財富。

sentences.english: He is the richest who is content with the least, for content.
sentences.chinese: 知足者最富有，因爲知足是自然的財富。

sentences.english: You people are like nothing is ever enough.
sentences.chinese: 你們這些人永遠不知足。

sentences.english: He is richest who is content with the least, for content is the wealth of nature.
sentences.chinese: 知足常樂者最富有，因爲知足本身就是天然的財富。

sentences.english: He is richest who is content with the least, for content is the wealth of nature.
sentences.chinese: 知足常樂者最富有，因爲知足本身就是天然的財富。

sentences.english: I would rather acquire that wisdom which will illumine my heart and give me satisfaction for ever.
sentences.chinese: 我寧願得到智慧，它會照亮我的心，使我始終地知足。

sentences.english: The happiest people are those who are contented with what they currently have, not with what they lack.
sentences.chinese: 最快樂的那些人總是會知足常樂，而不會傷懷所缺的。

sentences.english: Contentment means my happiness is not dependent uponcircumstances.
sentences.chinese: 知足意味着的我的快樂不取決於我所處的狀況。

definition: filial/dutiful/devoted to one's parents (and grandparents etc)/to show filial piety towards (an older family member)/filial piety
not having to worry about clothes and food (idiom)/to be provided with the basic necessities
to come to accept an unpleasant fact/to get over sth/to cheer up
